ctpMetaData.metaTitle: Best MBA Colleges in Mumbai (All) 2023: Fees, Rankings, Admission, Courses, Placements
ctpMetaData.bhstData:
There are 190 MBA colleges in Mumbai that offer MBA courses. Among them, 137 MBA colleges are privately owned and 11 MBA colleges are owned by the public/government organisations. CAT, XAT, and CMAT are the most accepting entrance exams in best MBA colleges in Mumbai. National Institute of Industrial Engineering, IIT Bombay, and SPJIMR are the most famous MBA institutes in Mumbai.

The revised position for some of the top MBA college in Mumbai is mentioned below:

  • National Institute of Industrial Engineering improved its ranking as it shifted to rank 7 in 2023 when as compared to rank 9 in 2022.
  • S. P. Jain Institute of Management & Research improved its ranking as it shifted to rank 20 in 2023 when as compared to rank 21 in 2022.

Latest Updates:

  • The XAT 2024 registration last date has been extended till Dec 10, 2023. Further, XAT 2024 admit card will be released on Dec 20, 2023 and the exam is scheduled for Jan 7, 2024. 
  • CAT exam 2023 was held on November 26, 2023. Registered candidates can download the official answer key from the IIMCAT website.
  • KMAT 2023 result is likely to be announced in the month of December 2023. Candidates who appeared for the KMAT Karnataka exam 2023 can check their results online.

Best MBA Colleges in Mumbai (All): Highlights 2023

MBA is one of the most popular post-graduate programs in Hyderabad. The two-year program is a gateway to a plethora of job opportunities in the corporate world. Students from any background, including Science, Commerce, and Humanities can pursue MBA. Such students should also possess important skills such as excellent communication, leadership, problem-solving, management, research-oriented, strong mathematical skills, etc.

Check out the key highlights of the MBA colleges Mumbai colleges below:

Parameters

No. of Colleges

INR 1-2 lakh: 15 colleges

INR 3-5 lakh: 30 colleges

INR > 5 lakh: 82 colleges

Top Specialisations

Finance, Sales & Marketing, HR, BA, etc.

Accepted Entrance Exams

CAT, MAT, XAT, CMAT, etc.

Predict your chances here: MBA 2023 Cutoff Predictor

How can I get admission to top MBA colleges in Mumbai?

The eligibility criteria for the MBA courses may differ from college to college. However, the basic eligibility criteria for top MBA college in Mumbai are as follows:

  • Candidates must have passed graduation in any discipline or equivalent from a recognised university as some basic eligibility criteria for MBA (full-time).
  • Most of the institutes follow the minimum score criteria for graduation which is 50 percent on average or equivalent. For reserved category students, the minimum score is 45 percent in aggregate.
  • Final-year graduation candidates are also eligible to apply for MBA, provided they present the proof of completion of graduation degree within the duration specified by the institute.

What are the entrance exams for MBA colleges in Mumbai (All)?

The two most popular entrance exams accepted in MBA College in Mumbai are:

  • XAT: XAT (Xavier Aptitude Test) is a national-level management entrance examination conducted by XLRI, Jamshedpur for admission to MBA/PGDM programmes. XAT preparation needs at least six to nine months. Being one of the tougher MBA entrance exams among its peers, XAT requires dedicated time and effort.
  • CAT: Common Admission Test (CAT) is a national level management aptitude test for admission to the MBA courses offered by 20 IIMs and over 1,200 B-schools in India. CAT question paper is divided into three sections: Verbal Ability and Reading Comprehension, Data Interpretation and Logical Reasoning and Quantitative Aptitude. The preparation for CAT exam should include phase wise completion of the CAT syllabus, mock test practice and revision.
  • MAT: Management Aptitude Test or MAT is a national-level entrance exam conducted by the All India Management Association (AIMA) for admissions to MBA/PGDM courses. The exam is conducted in multiple sessions in four phases – February, May, September and December. MAT exam is conducted in offline (Paper Based Test or PBT), online (Computer Based Test or CBT) and remote proctored (Internet Based Test or IBT) modes.

What are the entrance exams accepted by MBA Colleges in Mumbai?

The most popular entrance examinations for studying MBA courses in Mumbai are CAT and MAT. There are some other exams as well that are accepted by the MBA colleges in Mumbai, such as XAT, CMAT, ATMA, MAH CET, NMAT, MHT CET, etc. for admission into their colleges.

Which is the best college for MBA in Mumbai (All)?

National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranks colleges every year. The ranking is based on parameters and ranking changes year to year depending on the college/ university’s performance on parameters like infrastructure, placements, faculty, etc.

What is the Average Fee of Best MBA Colleges in Mumbai (All)?

Return on Investment (ROI) shows how much profit or benefit you get if you pursue a course from a particular college. It assesses the return of the fee invested by the candidate while studying and the return he/she gets in the form of placements.

Mumbai is the best destination for the placement package students get after completion of the course. Mumbai has many colleges which gave the best placements. Refer to the table below to know the best MBA fees in Mumbai and average placement package:

BA colleges in Mumbai offer diversified specialisations in Sales and Marketing, Finance, Human Resources, IT and Systems, Operations, Retail, Healthcare and Hospital, International Business, Business Analytics, Supply Chain, Transport & Logistics, IB, Travel & Tourism, Agriculture & Food Business, Pharma, Project Management, Public Policy, Rural Management, Data Science, etc.

Q: How many top MBA colleges are there in a Mumbai?

A: There are 187 MBA colleges in Mumbai that offer MBA courses. Among them, 134 MBA colleges are privately owned and 11 MBA colleges are owned by the public/government organisations. Master in Business Administration or MBA is a PG course offered in Management stream. MBA in Pune can be pursued by students who fulfil the eligibility as well as the selection criteria. Generally, students need to appear for an entrance exam, followed by GDPI round to qualify for admission. Some of the popular specialisations in which students can pursue MBA in Pune include Sales & Marketing, Finance, HR, Operations and Agriculture and Food Business, among others.
